title: Specialists in Digital and Science, Technology and Innovation
description:
**Senior and Junior Specialists in Digital and Science, Technology and Innovation**




 NTU is searching for consultants (short and long-term) for an upcoming EU tender in Sub-Saharan Africa,
 *Technical support (including on ‘evaluations’) to manage the Support Measures (Technical Assistance Component) for the Multiannual Indicative Programme.* 




**Location:** 
 Location: Sub-Saharan Africa and Europe (Remote/Field-Based)
 



**Duration:** 
 01/09/2025 – 30/09/2029
 



**Key Responsibilities:** 




*☝️* 
**Space Technologies & Digital Transformation** 



* Support the
 **development and implementation of space-based applications** 
 (Copernicus, Galileo) for
 **Earth Observation (EO) and Satellite Navigation (SatNav)** 
 in green transition sectors.
* Enhance
 **data accessibility and digital infrastructure** 
 to improve decision-making in land, water, agriculture, and climate change management.
* Strengthen
 **policy frameworks** 
 to mainstream space technologies into
 **national and regional digital transformation strategies** 
 .



*☝️* 
**Research & Innovation Leadership** 



* Support African researchers through
 **capacity-building initiatives** 
 , grants, and institutional strengthening under
 **ARISE 2.0** 
 .
* Promote
 **scientific excellence and innovation ecosystems** 
 by fostering collaborations between
 **African and European research institutions** 
 .
* Develop and implement strategies to
 **prevent brain drain and retain top-tier researchers** 
 in Africa.



*☝️* 
**Capacity Building & Policy Development** 



* Engage with
 **African Union institutions, regional space agencies, and national governments** 
 to integrate
 **digital and space technologies into policy frameworks** 
 .
* Design and execute
 **training programs and knowledge-sharing platforms** 
 to build local expertise in
 **digital innovation, space technology, and scientific research** 
 .
* Facilitate
 **public-private partnerships** 
 to foster a robust
 **digital and scientific ecosystem** 
 in Africa.



*☝️* 
**Outreach, Engagement & Private Sector Involvement** 



* Lead
 **awareness campaigns and stakeholder engagement strategies** 
 to showcase the benefits of space technologies and scientific research.
* Strengthen
 **collaborations between African and European research councils** 
 , universities, and digital innovators.
* Promote
 **gender-sensitive and inclusive research and innovation policies** 
 ensuring equitable participation of
 **women, youth, and marginalized groups** 
 .



  





**Key Requirements** 



* **Senior Specialists:**
 Minimum
 **12-15 years of experience** 
 in digital transformation, space technologies, scientific research, innovation policy, project implementation, digital infrastructure, research funding, or space technology applications.
* **Junior Specialists:**
 Minimum
 **5 -7 years of experience** 
 in digital transformation, space technologies, scientific research, innovation policy, project implementation, digital infrastructure, research funding, or space technology applications.
* Strong understanding of
 **EU-Africa cooperation on digital and innovation policies, space applications (Copernicus, Galileo), and research funding frameworks (Horizon Europe, ERC, ARISE, AU Science Strategy 2025)** 
 .
* Experience working with
 **government institutions, international organizations (AU, EU, AAS, AfSA, AfDB), and the private sector** 
 .
* Knowledge of
 **blended finance, tech-driven entrepreneurship, and digital policy frameworks** 
 is a plus.
* Fluency in
 **English and/or French** 
 ; knowledge of other languages spoken in Sub-Saharan Africa is a plus.



  





 If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply and upload your CV via LinkedIn or sent to recruitment@ntu.eu. Only the candidates with relevant experience will be contacted.

title: Verksamhetsutvecklare IT
description:
Som verksamhetsutvecklare tillhör du enheten IT Leveransstyrning på Svenska Kraftnät. I rollen som verksamhetsutvecklare kommer du få möjlighet att utveckla, vidareutveckla och effektivisera styrning och arbetssätt i en växande organisation med ett mycket viktigt uppdrag. Att hålla Sverige lysande.
   

  

 Vi är i dag flera hundra personer inom IT och vi kommer växa ytterligare de kommande åren. Vill du jobba och utvecklas i en växande organisation och tillsammans med underbara medarbetare skapa en robust IT-organisation? Sök dig till oss!
   

  

 Om tjänsten
   

  

 I denna roll kommer du först medverka i framtagandet av och sedan ansvara för IT-divisionens leveransmodell och därefter se till att den kontinuerligt anpassas efter organisationens behov. Du kommer även samverka med enhetens övriga verksamhetsutvecklare och vara delaktig i vidareutveckling och förvaltning av andra förmågor som enheten ansvarar för, som t.ex. portfölj, projekt, operativ modell och förändringsledning.
   

  

**Exempel På Arbetsuppgifter**
* Ansvara för IT leveransmodell
* Sammanhållande för metodik och process avseende IT leveransmodell
* Utveckla, driva och införa verksamhetsutvecklingsaktiviteter kopplade till processer, metoder och arbetssätt som avdelningen ansvarar för
* Upprätthålla nära samarbete med övriga delar av organisation, både inom division IT och övriga divisioner.


 Enheten IT Leveransstyrning har som uppdrag att utveckla och förvalta IT divisionens styrning och operativa modell så att den är anpassad efter organisationens långsiktiga strategier och mål, samt håller den flexibilitet som krävs för att möta befintliga och nya behov. Detta genom att leda och stödja så att ramverk, processer och metoder appliceras i syfte att skapa mervärde som utgår från Svenska kraftnäts strategi, mål och behov. Enheten ingår i avdelningen IT Ledningsstöd som ansvarar för styrning och strategi inom verkets IT division.
   

  

 Om dig
   

  

 För att trivas i rollen ser vi att du är en relationsbyggare som gärna samarbetar med kollegor på alla nivåer i organisationen. Du har förmåga att både lyssna och vara tydlig i din kommunikation. Du tycker om att skapa resultat tillsammans med andra och arbetar strukturerat för att nå både de kort- och långsiktiga målen.
   

  

 Det är viktig för dig att se till att omvärldsbevaka för att hålla dig uppdaterad på nya tekniker och arbetssätt. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Skallkrav
   

  

 Vidare ser vi att du har relevant akademisk examen minst 120 p/180 hp eller motsvarande kompetens förvärvad på annat sätt. Du har mycket goda kunskaper i svenska i tal och skrift.
   

  

 Du har även erfarenhet av att
   

  

* utveckla, införa och eller justera befintliga processer och arbetssätt inom IT i en organisation.
* tillämpa agila arbetssätt och eller agil styrning utifrån en organisations behov.
* ha jobbat i en större, komplex organisation (> 500 FTE)
* förvalta modell, system eller liknande.


 Det är meriterande med erfarenhet/er av
   

  

* Styrning av IT-utveckling och IT-förvaltning i privat sektor
* Att ha tillämpat någon IT-relaterad styrmodell (så som PPS, SAFe, eller liknande)
* Att haft ett leveransansvar: uppdragsledning, projektledning, leveransledning


 Bra att veta
   

  

* Tjänsten är placerad i Sundbyberg.
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 %
* Sista ansökningsdag är den 25 mars 2025. I samband med din ansökan bifogar du ditt CV och svarar på ett antal frågor. Du behöver inte bifoga ett personligt brev.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning.
* Förmåner | Svenska kraftnät


 Kontakta gärna rekryterande chef Mattias Wirén, 010 489 22 89. alternativt ansvarig rekryterare Victoria Waltenberg, 010 350 90 45. Fackliga representanter är Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010 475 87 72 och Mikael Hedenheim, ST, 010 475 84 68. Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se.
   

  

**Övrig information**
 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät kan det vara ett krav på svenskt medborgarskap i vissa befattningar. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.
   

  

 För mer information om säkerhetsprövning Svenska kraftnät arbetar för att främja mångfald och motverka diskriminering och ser gärna sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter till våra rekryteringar. Lär känna Svenska kraftnät och hur det är att arbeta hos oss: Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät

title: Business Analyst
description:
Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 Treasury Business Solutions is a group within Scania Treasury responsible for enhancing business systems and bridging the needs of the business with IT coordination. We are currently running and participating in several projects for services that will be utilized by the entire Scania Group.
   

  

 Scania Treasury, Business Solutions, are seeking a Business Analyst with a strong technical background in IT and expertise in the Treasury and payment area to further strengthen our team.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Working on projects as a Project Manager or project member in an international and decentralized organization.
* Supporting the treasury business with IT technical matters by being the interface to suppliers, Scania IT, and TRATON IT.
* Managing and coordinating the Change Management.
* Handling incident management within Treasury and coordinating incidents with business and third-party suppliers.
* Acting as a link between Business and IT, supporting business with IT-related matters, identifying business requirements, and coordinating testing within the TRATON Group.
* Coordinating IT & Cyber security according to ISEC (Information security at Scania).


**Who You Are**
 To be considered for this position, we are looking for candidates with the following competencies:
   

  

  

* Technical expertise: Strong knowledge of interfaces, databases, and server configurations.
* Project and change management: Experience working on projects and within Change Management.
* Information security: Experience working with Information Security (ISEC).
* Treasury and payments: Experience in Treasury and payment solutions.
* Application knowledge: Experience with Quantum and TRAX is an advantage.


**Language skills:** 
 Fluency in both written and spoken Swedish and English.
   

  

*We welcome applicants from all backgrounds – your unique experience and perspectives is valuable to us.*
**This Is Us**
 Scania Treasury is a department within Scania CV AB that is a competence centre and operationally responsible for handling financial risks, financing and cash management within the Scania Group.
   

  

 Treasury Business Solutions are responsible for the Treasury Application landscape. The team is responsible for design and develop Treasury processes together with the business across the whole TRATON Group.
   

  

**Scania Offers**
 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

 Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-04-07. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact:
   

  

 Example: Liisa Forsman Rosth, Head of Treasury Business, liisa.forsman-rosth@scania.com
   

  

**We look forward to your application!**

title: Digital Transformation Lead - Business Process
company_industry: Defense and Space Manufacturing, Security and Investigations, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
*Passionate about making ideas a reality? Join our welcoming world of tech and let your ideas soar.*
 Join us in building the future! We’re forming a cutting-edge digital transformation team at the heart of the Surveillance organization, where you’ll be driving impactful change across processes using AI, automation, and advanced technologies. This is a unique opportunity to shape and lead our process transformation from the ground up, pioneering new ways of working that will push boundaries and unlock business potential.
   

  

 Your role
   

  

 The Digital Transformation Lead drives innovation and business-led digital transformation across Saab Surveillance. You will develop and implement methods, blueprints, and best practices to accelerate digitalization and new ways of working.
   

  

 By leading cross-functional teams and enabling strategic alignment, you ensure scalable and value-driven transformation. Your role includes driving proof of concepts, facilitating innovation, and establishing effective collaboration models to enhance digital execution across the organisation.
   

  

 The role will be part of Surveillance new Digital Transformation office, a forward-leaning central team at the COO Office. Working closely with colleagues in our various business units, as well as with experts in AI, Data, Change Management, and other key areas. The role will collaborate with transformation partners (internal and external) and leverage both Saab Business Area IT and Corporate IT digitalization capabilities to advance digitalization opportunities and push our transformation initiatives forward.
   

  

 Your profile
   

  

 The person we are looking for, also hold effective collaboration, relationship-building skills and strong in emotional intelligence. We also see that you are a structured and systematic person. We believe that you motivate and engage others, with your communication & change management skills. Regarding experience and education, we are looking for who have:
   

  

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business Information Systems, or a related field
* Experience in intelligent automation technologies (e.g., RPA, cognitive automation, machine learning, process mining, workflow automation)
* Experience in AI technologies (e.g., machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, computer vision, AI-driven analytics, generative AI)
* Fluent in both Swedish and English


 It is meritorious if you have:
   

  

* Experience in end-to-end digital transformation delivery, including assessment, design, development, deployment, and scaling of digital solutions
* Experience with security, governance and compliance in digitalization projects, ensuring solutions are secure, compliant, and sustainable
* Experience leading digital-driven transformation projects, preferably within complex, cross-functional environments (industries like tech, manufacturing, defense, as well as supporting functions such as finance, procurement, project management and quality)
* Understanding of transformation and improvement methodologies (e.g., Lean, Value Stream Mapping, Change Management, Design thinking) and how they integrate with digitalization initiatives


 If you’re passionate about innovation, thrive on solving complex challenges, and want to be part of something new and bold, this is your chance to make a real difference. Come help us lead the future!
   

  

 This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.
   

  

 What you will be part of
   

  

 Behind our innovations stand the people who make them possible. Brave pioneers and curious minds. Everyday heroes and inventive troubleshooters. Those who share deep knowledge and those who explore sky-high. And everyone in between.
   

  

 Joining us means making an impact together, contributing in our own unique ways. From crafting complex code and building impressive defence and security solutions to simply sharing a coffee with a colleague, every action counts. We encourage you to take on challenges, to create smart inventions and grow in our friendly and tech-savvy workspace. We have a solid mission to keep people and society safe.
   

  

 Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 25,500 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.
   

  

 Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here

title: Internal IT and Security Director
description:
Mentimeter is an engagement tool with a clear goal in mind. To turn presentations into conversations. Through real-time interactivity and clear visualizations, we get people to participate, engage and become more productive. Transforming all those passive meetings, airless classrooms and drawn out trainings into valuable and memorable moments.
   

  

 We truly believe that you achieve the best results by doing things together. And that successful leaders need to adopt a curious and collaborative mindset in order to get there. So with you at Mentimeter, you’ll be a big part of the ambition to help over 1 billion people listen, learn and work better together.
   

  

 As our Internal IT and Security Director you will be part of developing a newly created function to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of our internal IT operations. This responsibility has previously been shared between, amongst others, our CTO, CTIO and some other department heads. Those responsibilities will now be transferred into a central role reporting to the CFO. In that central role you’ll be collaborating closely with stakeholders from the entire Mentimeter organization ranging from the legal to department heads. Your goal will be to catalyze and enable the entire organization. You will also have the formal role as the Security Officer for the company.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Maintain and update Mentimeter IT strategy, and management team, company objectives and key stakeholders alignment.
* Manage the annual IT budget
* Team leadership and line management responsibilities, leading a team of 3 direct reports
* Lead the overall Information Security work in collaboration with stakeholders at the company
* Hold the formal role as Security Officer for Mentimeter AB
* Audit and take action when needed and enforce IT policies, procedures, and compliance with regulations and business needs.
* Oversee and manage IT, applications and systems environment and infrastructure (excluding the infrastructure and systems that are delivering our own SaaS product
* Ensure necessary availability, reliability, and security of IT systems
* Ensure information architecture is sound and data integrity is maintained
* Accountable for service desk for IT-related issues, providing guidance and support
* Vendor management for both internal systems with employee data as well as CRM and automation systems with external customer data
* Process owner for new vendor procurement, vendor relationships as well as sunsetting vendors
* Note: You are not the budget owner or decision maker of most systems. that is the department head, but you will own the overall process and enforce e.g. compliance and ensure there is a solid business case for the procurement. You will act as the advisor to owners of systems in the Sales, Marketing, Catalyst, Product and Finance & Legal departments


**Who are you?**
 To thrive in this role, we believe you embrace IT operations as an enabler for organizational success. You are motivated by the commercial value that technology can create and are driven by finding innovative solutions to support such efforts.
   

  

 Additionally, you possess strong leadership skills, project management expertise and a strategic mindset that aligns IT strategy with business goals. Your excellent communication and stakeholder management skills allow you to explain and simplify complex topics to non-technical colleagues and stakeholders, fostering a collaborative environment.
   

  

 You like to work in the cross-section of entrepreneurial approach and doing it by the book. You’re passionate about leading others and helping colleagues reach their highest potential. You also thrive in an environment that highly values building a culture of continuous improvements in the IT department.
   

  

**What experiences will you be expected to bring with you, you may ask?**
* At least 8+ years of proven experience in an IT management role, with 4+ years in senior leadership
* Experience with BYOD environment and best-of-breed vendor strategies
* Strong proficiency in various IT systems and infrastructure, including IT security, network administration, and cloud-based systems.
* Demonstrated success in managing and negotiating with vendors, including software and hardware suppliers.
* Experience with automation tools and scripting skills
* Track record of establishing and managing IT budgets
* Ability to develop and implement IT strategies aligned with company objectives
* Experience with IT compliance and regulatory environments.
* Previous line management and team leader experience empowering your team members and supporting their growth
* Fully proficiency in English, both in written and verbal communication


 Looking To Really Stand Out From The Crowd? Here Are Some Of The Bonus Points That Will Help You Do So
   

  

* Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, or a related field
* Certification in IT governance or security, such as CISM, CISSP
* Programming skills
* Ability to conduct technology audits and implement corrective measures
* Experience from working at a listed company
* Experience from working in similar-sized (200-500 people) fast-growing companies


 Still not sure if you’d tick all the boxes? Welcome with your application anyway as we look forward to getting to know your background and success stories.
   

  

**Recruitment Process**
* Introduction interview - Meet TA partner for an introduction interview
* Business Case - Conduct a case home assignment
* Competence interview - Meet the team at our office for an in-depth onsite interview to showcase your skills, domain knowledge and core competencies
* Alva Labs tests - Conduct a personality and logical ability test as part of the screening process
* Culture & Leadership interview - Reflect more about our 5 core values and why your leadership would be a great fit at Mentimeter


**What Mentimeter Can Offer**
 At Mentimeter we can offer a diverse and inclusive work environment supported by smart and driven colleagues. We believe in continuous professional development for all of our colleagues and therefore offer access to a leadership program (including external personal coach) and relevant education to ensure that we continue to be state-of-the-art when it comes to innovating and building Mentimeter. Your place will be in a growing company with lots of career opportunities, working on a beloved product used by more than 300 million people. It’s not all about work though, we also offer a very healthy view on work-life balance.
   

  

 All of this comes attached with a competitive compensation and benefits package, including pension contributions. Learn more about our benefits by visiting our Benefits & Perks page
   

  

**Culture at Mentimeter**
 At Mentimeter we believe in giving everyone a voice - regardless of who you are. So we build a platform that does just that. Our platform is not only our product but also our organization. A platform where people feel safe, where differences are embraced, a place where you can have fun. We strongly encourage applicants who are people of color, LGBTQ+, women, people with disabilities, and/or formerly incarcerated people, and a college degree is not strictly required. In order to give everyone a voice, we need to be as diverse as our users.
   

  

 Learn more about our culture by visiting our Culture page.
   

  

 Review our Privacy Policy for more information.

title: IT-Forensiker
description:
*Vill du ta nästa steg i din karriär på ett av världens ledande revisions- och rådgivningsföretag? På PwC motiveras vi av att använda vår uppfinningsförmåga, erfarenhet och den senaste tekniken för att skapa värde för våra kunder. Drivet finns hos alla som jobbar hos oss och tillsammans löser vi komplexa uppgifter, utvecklar företag och har en positiv påverkan på samhället.*
**Bli en del av PwC:s utredningsteam**
 Som medarbetare inom PwC:s forensiska team stöttar du företag och organisationer inom den privata, offentliga och finansiella sektorn. Vårt tjänsteutbud innefattar bland annat utredningar, förebyggande arbete mot ekonomiska oegentligheter och penningtvätt, visselblåsarfunktioner, bakgrundskontroller, IT-forensik samt många andra tjänster ämnade åt att identifiera oegentligheter och stärka våra kunders organisationer. Dina arbetsdagar varierar med dina projekt, ena veckan arbetar du med att genomföra IT-forensisk datainsamling hos kund, för att nästa vecka genomföra en djupgående dataanalys på vårt kontor. Du arbetar alltid tillsammans med andra i ett gemensamt team för att stötta våra kunder att lösa sina utmaningar och skapa långsiktigt hållbara lösningar. Som företag handlar vårt arbete inte bara om våra kunder och medarbetare – vi vill även bidra till ett mer hållbart och rättvist samhälle för alla. Läs mer om våra tjänsteområden inom Forensic Services.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 PwC:s forensiska team söker nu dig med minst två års erfarenhet inom IT-forensik som vill arbeta med forensiska utredningar. Arbetet inkluderar tekniska uppgifter som att säkra och bearbeta data från olika källor, samt att analysera och sammanställa komplex data. Arbetsuppgifterna varierar beroende på typen av utredning och kan skilja sig från projekt till projekt. Vi söker dig som trivs med både tekniskt arbete och andra aspekter av forensiska utredningar, och som uppskattar ett varierande arbete.
   

  

 PwC:s forensiska tjänster utgår främst från kontoret i Stockholm, så det är därför önskvärt att du bor i Stockholmsområdet eller är beredd att flytta/resa dit. Men då avdelningen befinner sig i en expansiv fas finns det dock även möjlighet att arbeta från något av våra kontor i Göteborg eller Malmö.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Vi söker en erfaren IT-forensiker med minst två års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet, gärna från Polisen eller en liknande myndighet.
   

  

 Du ska ha gedigen kunskap i att identifiera och spegla/extrahera data från relevanta datakällor med hjälp av etablerade forensiska verktyg och metoder. Dessutom förväntas du kunna utföra analyser baserade på vanligt förekommande IT-forensiska frågeställningar, såsom händelseloggsanalys samt återskapande av borttagen data.
   

  

 Erfarenhet av dataanalys och databashantering är mycket meriterande. Du har en stark förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i nya tekniska systemlösningar och behärskar både svenska och engelska flytande, i både tal och skrift.
   

  

 Det är meriterande om du har utbildning eller certifiering inom IT-forensik, samt kunskaper i EnCase- eller eDiscovery-plattformar som exempelvis Relativity.
   

  

 Som person är du engagerad, en skicklig problemlösare och har lätt för att bygga relationer. Du är även ansvarstagande och lägger stor vikt vid att leverera goda resultat.
   

  

 ,
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Välkommen med din ansökan till oss senast den 31 maj 2025. Vi kommer att gå igenom ansökningarna löpande och tjänsten kan tillträdas tidigare än sista ansökningsdagen.
   

  

**Tillträde:** 
 Omgående enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Vi ber dig bifoga följande handlingar med din ansökan:
   

  

* CV
* Personligt brev


**Rekryteringsprocessen**
 Vi tror på styrkan i att ha en rekryteringsprocess som gäller för alla. Som en del av urvalet använder vi oss därför av arbetspsykologiska tester med syfte att säkerställa ett objektivt, fördomsfritt och rättvist urval. Testerna är ett första steg i vår urvalsprocess. Du får en länk till dessa när vi har tagit emot din ansökan.
   

  

 Vi värdesätter det personliga mötet för att se vilket värde just du kan tillföra PwC men också vad vi kan erbjuda dig. Intervjuprocessen består vanligtvis av flera steg och olika typer av intervjuer. När du träffar HR, har du en kompetensbaserad intervju där vi tittar på personlighetstestet som du genomfört innan intervjun. Vid intervjun med verksamheten får du möjlighet att träffa det aktuella teamet för att gå igenom rollen.
   

  

 Vi kallar till intervju löpande.
   

  

 För frågor gällande tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen vänligen kontakta ansvarig rekryterare.

title: Azure Tekniker
description:
Som
 **Azure Tekniker** 
 hos oss blir du en
 **central del av vårt team** 
 och får chansen att arbeta med några av marknadens mest spännande molnprojekt. Vi letar efter dig som
 **brinner för teknik** 
 , gillar att lösa problem och vill vara med och bygga framtidens IT-lösningar! 🚀
   

  

* Bygga och drifta molnlösningar – Du ser till att våra kunders Azure-miljöer är stabila, säkra och optimerade.
* Migrera och modernisera – Du hjälper till att flytta verksamheter från traditionella IT-miljöer till moderna molnplattformar.
* Felsöka och förbättra – Du identifierar flaskhalsar, säkerhetsrisker och optimeringsmöjligheter.
* Stödja och samarbeta – Du arbetar tätt ihop med arkitekter, utvecklare och kunder för att skapa de bästa lösningarna.
* Lära och utvecklas – Tekniken förändras snabbt, och vi ser till att du alltid ligger steget före genom kompetensutveckling och utbildningar.


 Här får du en
 **praktisk och varierad roll** 
 där du både får jobba hands-on och utvecklas strategiskt – med stöd av ett erfaret och härligt team!
   

  

**Vi söker dig som** 
 🌟
   

  

* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta som konsult inom IT-infrastruktur, med fokus på Azure.
* Besitter teknisk kompetens inom Microsofts infrastruktur- och plattformstjänster i Azure.
* Är van vid att arbeta med molnlösningar och har en proaktiv inställning till problemlösning.
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på engelska, både i tal och skrift.


**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 🎁
   

  

* Konkurrenskraftig lön som speglar din erfarenhet och kompetens. 💰
* Flexibla arbetsförhållanden för att underlätta balansen mellan arbete och privatliv.
* Stora möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling genom interna utbildningar och vår egen Cloud Skola. 📚
* En inkluderande och stödjande arbetsmiljö där dina idéer och ditt engagemang värdesätts.
* Sociala aktiviteter och gemensamma evenemang, från årliga konferensresor till regelbundna After Works och andra roliga aktiviteter. 🎉


**Om B3 Consulting Group**
*B3 Consulting Group är ett expansivt konsultbolag med cirka 1000 medarbetare. Vi brinner för innovation och hjälper Sveriges ledande företag och organisationer att skapa framtidens möjligheter genom digital transformation. B3 finns på* 
 tolv orter i Sverige samt i Polen, med huvudkontor i Stockholm. Bolaget grundades 2003, är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm Small Cap och omsatte 1 141 MSEK 2023.
   

  

*Vi är stolta över vår prisbelönta företagskultur, där olikheter, erfarenheter och gemensam energi värdesätts. Som ett etiskt och transparent bolag strävar vi efter att ha en positiv påverkan på samhället, människor och miljön. Vi är även engagerade i Women in Tech och initiativ för att stärka AI-utbildning för kvinnor. 2024 utsågs vi till Årets Employer Branding-företag, och vår HR-chef vann titeln Årets HR-chef.*
 💌
 **Låter det spännande?** 
 Hör av dig! Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig!

title: Salesforce Administrator
description:
I have an exciting opportunity for a Senior Salesforce Administrator to join a trusted financial partner specializing in delivering personalized solutions for investments, pensions, and corporate benefits. Known for its transparency, innovation, and sustainability, it combines cutting-edge digital tools with a client-focused approach.
 



  





 This is a hybrid role in Stockholm (3 days in the office)
 



  





 Salary - Up to 65,000 SEK depending on experience
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Manage and configure Salesforce users, profiles, roles, and security settings.
* Oversee data integrity, migrations, and deduplication efforts.
* Implement and maintain automation solutions using workflows, process builders, and flows.
* Stay informed about Salesforce updates and proactively apply relevant enhancements.
* Work closely with business stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions..



**Qualifications:** 



* **Fluent** 
 Swedish & English
* Proven experience as a Salesforce Administrator (preferably senior level).
* Strong foundation in user management, security configuration, data management, and workflow automation.
* Ability to gather business requirements and translate them into actionable Salesforce solutions.
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies and Scrum Master experience is a bonus.
* Passion for continuous learning, with a willingness to pursue additional training and certifications as needed.

title: Sales Executive - New Business - PSO
description:
Meet Unit4, a fast-paced, game-changing SaaS company revolutionizing ERP for scale-ups, mid-market organizations, and category leaders. We’re not just rewriting the rules of enterprise software; we’re tearing up the old playbook. For 40 years, the ERP industry has been bogged down by clunky, legacy systems, and we’re here to shake things up.
   

  

 At Unit4, we’re all about transformation. We empower ambitious businesses with cutting-edge ERP solutions that are adaptive, intuitive, and self-driving—designed to free organizations from the mundane and help them focus on what truly matters. Our mission? To turn work into something more meaningful while helping our customers achieve their greatest potential. Want to learn more about how we’re reshaping the future? Head to our website and see how we’re helping businesses thrive.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 We’ve got an exciting opportunity, to join our high-energy, fast-growing sales team. If you’re a natural hunter, a born deal-closer, and someone who thrives in fast-paced environments, this is your chance to shine.
   

  

 As a New Business Sales Executive, you’ll play a critical role in driving digital transformation for scale-ups, mid-market organizations, and category leaders in the Professional Services sector. Your mission: sell Unit4’s ERP Financial and HCM solutions, win new logos, and help our clients unlock their true potential.
   

  





  

*This is a hybrid role based out of our Stockholm office.*




 What You’ll Do
   

  




* Craft and execute a killer new business sales strategy to hit ambitious targets in the Professional Services vertical.
* Qualify leads like a pro and engage key decision-makers with a consultative, value-driven approach.
* Own complex sales cycles from start to finish, orchestrating cross-functional teams—pre-sales, value engineering, marketing, and more—to close big deals.
* Deliver powerful, results-oriented presentations to C-level execs, focusing on their core challenges and the Office of the CFO.
* Help prospects see the business impact of our solutions, turning skeptics into believers.
* Stay ahead of the curve by mastering our tech and keeping up with industry trends


**Qualifications**
* You’re a go-getter with at least 3-5 years of experience selling complex SaaS solutions.
* You have a proven track record in ERP or financial SaaS sales (mandatory).
* You’re a pro at navigating the Professional Services sector and understand its unique needs.
* Business processes? You know them inside and out.
* You have the charisma to inspire, the resilience to negotiate, and the vision to guide clients toward success.
* You’re a team player with a hunter’s mindset, always looking for that next big win.
* You’re comfortable engaging and influencing C-level executives, turning tough challenges into bold opportunities.
* Mentorship, leadership, and collaboration come naturally to you—you’re always ready to lift others while driving results.


**Additional Information**

 Why Unit4?
   

  





  

 At Unit4, we believe in big ideas, bold action, and breaking barriers. Here’s what sets us apart:
   

  




* Freedom to Thrive: We trust you to own your role and drive success, offering autonomy and flexibility.
* Uncapped Time Off: Take the time you need to recharge—your well-being matters.
* Global Wellbeing Days: When we say “switch off,” we mean it. We all take time to prioritize health and balance.
* Next-Level Talent: Collaborate with some of the sharpest minds in the software industry.
* Purpose-Driven Impact: Be part of our Act4Good program, where innovation meets sustainability to make the world better.
* Inclusive Culture: We’re committed to diversity, equity, and belonging through our Employee Resource Groups like Women at Unit4, Pride at Unit4, and Mental Health & Access at Unit4.



 This is your chance to join a company that’s as ambitious as you are. If you’re ready to disrupt the status quo and make a real impact, let’s talk.
   

  

 Ready to take the leap? Apply now and let’s make work better, together.

title: Technology/Climate technology Underwriter
description:
Chubb is a world leader in insurance. With operations in 54 countries and territories, Chubb provides commercial and personal property and casualty insurance, personal accident and supplemental health insurance, reinsurance and life insurance to a diverse group of clients. As an underwriting company, we assess, assume and manage risk with insight and discipline. We service and pay our claims fairly and promptly. The company is also defined by its extensive product and service offerings, broad distribution capabilities, exceptional financial strength and local operations globally. Parent company Chubb Limited is listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE: CB) and is a component of the S&P 500 index. Chubb maintains executive offices in Zurich, New York, London, Paris and other locations, and employs approximately 40,000 people worldwide. Additional information can be found at: www.chubb.com .
 



  





 In the Nordics we are an organization of 140 employees.
 



  





**The role purpose** 




  





 Chubb is growing and we are looking for a passionate Technology/Climate technology Underwriter to join our Technology Practice team in the Nordics. In the role as Underwriter, you will focus specifically on Technology and Climate Technology.
 



  





 Are you ready for the next step in your career and would you prefer to take it in a fun and professional team at an international, renowned insurer? Then you are in the right place.
 



  





 This exciting role can suit an Underwriter who is hungry, motivated, inquisitive and in need of a new challenge. We will consider a similar minded hardworking person who feels ready to take the next step in the career.
 



  





 We require someone to develop and assist in underwriting Technology risks. Maintaining and building relationships with our Nordic brokers community with an ambition to write additional new business, which will be key to the success of this role, as well as growing the existing portfolio in line with our agreed growth targets, pricing and retention budget.
 



  





**You make an impact and strengthen our market position by:** 



* Building and maintaining good relationships with brokers.
* Promoting our capabilities and building of a profitable Technology/climate technology portfolio.
* Strong commercial drive, always looking for new opportunities and value service and quality.
* Ensuring quality control by means of including underwriting and peer reviews.
* Representing and promoting Chubb to brokers and clients.
* Delivering strong service to brokers and clients, responding to cross-sell and new business opportunities and monitoring retention.
* Meeting the portfolio product line objectives of the Northern Zone Technology practice team for each underwriting year.



  





**Profile requirements :** 



* Fundamental understanding of and experience from underwriting processes preferably within Technology and Climate Technology
* Degree in Engineering, Computer sciences or business administration or technical / business experience background with an interest for new technologies.
* A strong commercial drive and very customer-oriented approach.
* Experience from client servicing preferably from the insurance industry.
* Demonstrated skills in building and maintaining client relationships preferably from the insurance industry.
* Results driven, disciplined and ambitious with ability to work on own initiative.
* Good communicator and fluent in Swedish (or another Nordic language) and high level of English written as well as spoken.



  





**Why You Want To Work At Chubb** 



* We offer a high-performance work environment in which appreciation and inclusiveness are of paramount importance.
* As an underwriter at Chubb, no two days are the same. You interact with various stakeholders and actively pursue opportunities. Where you do that? From our office in Stockholm, on location during meetings with clients/brokers or from your home office.
* At Chubb, the customer experience is key. With us, insurance is not a static product, but is continuously adapted to the needs of the market.
* As a Chubb employee, you are part of the world's largest publicly traded property and casualty insurance company, providing solutions to businesses of all sizes.
* At Chubb, we operate on the basis of trust. You have a high degree of autonomy, flexibility and also access to a multitude of training and development opportunities.



  





 If you have any questions, please feel free to contact
 **Robin Roos** 
 , Technology Practice Leader for the Northern Zone via:
 ***Tel: + 31 61422 8765 / Robin.Roos@chubb.com.***




 We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Systemansvarig
description:
Svenska kraftnät är en av de viktigaste aktörerna för en hållbar energiomställning. Som systemansvarig erbjuds du ett av Sveriges viktigaste IT jobb, i vilket du varje dag kommer att bidra till Sveriges elförsörjning. Vi behöver dig för att lyckas med vårt samhällsviktiga uppdrag att elektrifiera Sverige.
   

  

 Vi är i dag ca 600 personer på IT och vi kommer att växa ytterligare de kommande åren. Detta för att kunna skapa förutsättningar för Sverige att kunna fördubbla sin elproduktion och nå klimatmålen genom att helt ställa om till fossilfri energi. För att lyckas kommer vi att använda oss av den senaste tekniken för att öka kapaciteten i vår infrastruktur och samtidigt öka utvecklingstakten kring system, digitalisering och processer.
   

  

 Vill du jobba och utvecklas i en växande organisation tillsammans med kompetenta kollegor i en framåtlutad och robust IT-organisation, sök dig till oss!
   

  

**Om tjänsten** 
 Som systemansvarig kommer du att säkerställa att ingående system möter morgondagens behov. Med ett strategiskt och framåtblickande fokus arbetar du proaktivt med att identifiera och bevaka nya möjligheter. Vi uppmuntrar självständighet där du driver egna initiativ som tillför värde, förbättrar systemprocesser och som främjar verksamhetens utveckling framåt.
   

  

 I tjänsten ingår även att
   

  

* Säkerställa säker drift, incident- och problemhantering av de system du ansvarar för
* Hantera frågor relaterade till tekniska systemkrav och drift av systemen
* Hantera beställningar mot andra delar av IT-organisationen
* Ansvara för den strategiska planeringen av förvaltningsaktiviteter och säkerställa en tydlig roadmap för systemen med fokus på tekniska lösningar i nära samarbete med verksamheten
* Planera, driva och följa upp aktiviteter enligt förvaltningsplanen


 Som systemansvarig har du ett nära samarbete med övriga enheter inom IT-divisionen, verksamheten och leverantörer för att lösa problem och incidenter samt vidareutveckla befintligt IT-stöd. I rollen ingår även att delta i projekt för införande av framtida och nya IT-lösningar.
   

  

 Rollen tillhör enheten Modellhanteringsapplikationer, som för närvarande består av ca 10 medarbetare. Enheten ansvarar för och tillhandahåller robust, effektiv och värdeskapande utveckling och förvaltning av system som stödjer verksamhetsprocesser som fokuserar på avbrottsplanering, kapacitetshantering och modellering av systemdrift och framtida kraftsystem. Applikationerna har höga krav på säkerhet, riktighet och tillgänglighet.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder dig
   

  

 Hos oss kommer du att få möjlighet att utvecklas och utbyta erfarenheter med kollegor som verkat länge inom branschen. Om du gillar att vara med och påverka och driva förändring, då kommer du trivas bra hos oss. Vi är en IT-tung organisation som gör stora investeringar och satsar på kompetensutveckling för våra medarbetare. Dessutom erbjuder vi förmånliga semestervillkor, flexibla arbetstider och en mötespolicy som ger goda möjligheter att balansera arbete och privatliv.
   

  

 Om dig
   

  

 För att bli framgångsrik i rollen behöver du vara strukturerad och resultatorienterad, samtidigt som du har en naturlig förmåga att samarbeta och skapa bra relationer. Du använder din kommunikativa förmåga när du för arbetet framåt och hanterar utmaningar på ett effektivt och lösningsorienterat sätt.
   

  

 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Vidare Ser Vi Att Du Har Högskoleutbildning Inom IT-området Eller Motsvarande Kompetens Förvärvad På Annat Sätt. Du Har Även
   

  

* Arbetat några år med system/applikationsförvaltning i en komplex IT-miljö enligt någon styrningsmodell
* Praktisk erfarenhet av operativsystemet MS Windows
* Praktisk erfarenhet av Azure Devops
* Praktisk erfarenhet av att sätta upp och förvalta integrationer
* Erfarenhet av felsökning och konfiguration av integrationslösningar
* Praktisk erfarenhet av .Net, Webserver, SQL databas och WebAPI
* Du talar samt förstår svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


 Vi ser det som meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Dialog och samarbete med externa leverantörer
* Arbetat med systemsäkerhet eller hos en organisation med höga IT-säkerhetskrav
* Ett eller flera av dessa områden; Kafka, OP5, Grafana, SCOM, Linux/Unix
* Agila arbetsmetoder


**Bra att veta**
* Tjänsten är placerad i Sundbyberg
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 %
* Sista ansökningsdag är 25 mars. Vi använder urvalsfrågor och tar därför inte emot personligt brev i samband med din ansökan
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidaretjänst utan provanställning
* Förmåner | Svenska kraftnät


 Kontakta gärna ansvarig rekryterare Pia Boström, tel. nr. 0703-14 68 66 (pia.bostrom@se.experis.com). Rekryterande chef är Anna Ljung tel. nr. 010-475 8769. Fackliga representanter är Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010 475 87 72 och Mikael Hedenheim ST, 010 475 84 68. Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se
   

  

**Övrig information**
 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät kan det vara ett krav på svenskt medborgarskap i vissa befattningar. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.
   

  

 För mer information om säkerhetsprövning Svenska kraftnät arbetar för att främja mångfald och motverka diskriminering och ser gärna sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter till våra rekryteringar. Lär känna Svenska kraftnät och hur det är att arbeta hos oss: Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät

title: Digital Transformation Lead- Supply Chain & Manufacturing
company_industry: Defense and Space Manufacturing, Security and Investigations, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
*Passionate about making ideas a reality? Join our welcoming world of tech and let your ideas soar.*
 Your role
   

  

 As a Digital Transformation Lead focused on Supply Chain and Manufacturing, you will be a driving force behind digital innovation and modernization within Saab Surveillance. Your mission is to develop and implement strategies, frameworks, and best practices that optimize and transform our supply chain and manufacturing operations.
   

  

 You will lead cross-functional teams of experts, ensuring alignment between business needs and technological solutions. This involves identifying opportunities for automation, process improvement, and data-driven decision making across the entire value chain – from procurement and production to logistics and after-sales service.
   

  

 Working closely with colleagues in our business units, as well as with specialists in areas like AI, data analytics, and change management, you will drive proof-of-concept projects, pilot new technologies, and establish collaborative models to accelerate digital adoption. You will leverage the expertise of both Saab Business Area IT and Corporate IT to identify and implement the most effective digitalization solutions.
   

  

 This role is part of the Surveillance Digital Transformation Office, a central team within the COO Office dedicated to propelling Saab Surveillance into the future of intelligent operations.
   

  

 Your profile
   

  

 We believe that you motivate and engage others, with your communication & change management skills. The person we are looking for, also hold effective collaboration, relationship-building skills and strong in emotional intelligence. We also see that you are a structured and systematic person.
   

  

 Regarding experience and education, we are looking for who have:
   

  

* Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Engineering, Supply Chain Management, Operations Research, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Digital Transformation Expertise: Proven experience in leading and implementing digital transformation initiatives within manufacturing and supply chain environments.
* Communication Skills: Fluent in both Swedish and English, with excellent written and verbal communication skills for clear and concise communication across all levels of the organisation.
* Technology Proficiency: Hands-on experience with technologies relevant to supply chain and manufacturing optimization, including:
+ Industry 4.0 technologies (e.g., IIoT, Digital Twins, Advanced Robotics, AI/ML in manufacturing)
+ ERP & Supply Chain Management systems (e.g., IFS)
+ Cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, GCP) for data-driven supply chain solutions.
+ Predictive Analytics, Demand Forecasting, or Supply Chain Optimization models.
+ Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) or Smart Factory solutions.
+ RPA (Robotic Process Automation) in procurement, production planning, or order management workflows.
+ Supply Chain Control Towers, Digital Supply Chain Visibility platforms, or Real-Time Dashboards.
+ Cybersecurity practices in OT/Manufacturing environments.


 It is meritorious if you have:
   

  

* Experience in end-to-end digital transformation delivery, including assessment, design, development, deployment, and scaling of digital solutions
* Preferably within end-to-end supply chain or production process transformations
* Experience leading digital-driven transformation projects, preferably within complex, cross-functional environments (industries like tech, manufacturing, defense, as well as supporting functions such as finance, procurement, project management and quality)
* Understanding of transformation and improvement methodologies such as; lean, six sigma, change management, design thinking, digital threads or similar combined with digital tools


 If you’re passionate about innovation, thrive on solving complex challenges, and want to be part of something new and bold, this is your chance to make a real difference. Come help us lead the future!
   

  

*This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.*
 What you will be part of
   

  

 Behind our innovations stand the people who make them possible. Brave pioneers and curious minds. Everyday heroes and inventive troubleshooters. Those who share deep knowledge and those who explore sky-high. And everyone in between.
   

  

 Joining us means making an impact together, contributing in our own unique ways. From crafting complex code and building impressive defence and security solutions to simply sharing a coffee with a colleague, every action counts. We encourage you to take on challenges, to create smart inventions and grow in our friendly and tech-savvy workspace. We have a solid mission to keep people and society safe.
   

  

 Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 25,500 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.
   

  

 Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here

title: Senior Account Executive
description:
**Your Impact:** 




 As an Account Executive at OpenText you help customers use information to grow faster and be more efficient in an increasingly Digital World. You are part of a global team of highly skilled and entrepreneurial professionals who understand that their customers are experiencing unprecedented change.
 



 Your customers trust your judgment to help them solve their most pressing business problems and to support them in their journey to the cloud and to become a digital enterprise. You will stop at nothing to help them find the right solution to positively impact the business, improve their most important business processes, or reduce their risks.
 



 You are comfortable with complex sales cycles. Your track record of successful attainment of your targets will be rewarded with one of the most competitive compensation packages in the industry.
 



  





**What the role offers:** 




 · Consultative selling and intensely listening to your customers.
 



 · Preparing comprehensive territory plans.
 



 · Identifying and converting opportunities into sales.
 



 · Skillfully executing each phase of the sales process from pipeline generation to closing the deal.
 



 · Masterful client presentations and running effective meetings.
 



 · Clearly articulating the value proposition of solutions and products and the endless possibilities of the digital enterprise to your customers.
 



 · Collaboration across all internal teams and resources to ensure you bring the best solution to your clients.
 



  





**What you need to succeed:** 




 · A track record of at least five years of B2B selling across the Enterprise.
 



 · Experience working in a consultative capacity with C-level customers on complex cloud-based, on-premises or hybrid solutions.
 



 · Expert knowledge of the B2B buying process and know all your key competitors and closely follow industry trends.
 



 · You deploy advanced sales methodologies and tools to achieve and exceed your targets.
 



 · Whether it’s the challenge of developing new accounts or finding untapped opportunities in your existing client base, the opportunity to grow our business is what drives your efforts every day.
 



 · Intellectual curiosity, easily grasp new products and solutions, and bring the spirit of innovation to your customers.
 



 · Bachelor’s Degree and a passion for continuous learning.
 



  





**One Last Thing:** 




 OpenText is more than just a corporation, it's a global community where trust is foundational, the bar is raised, and outcomes are owned. As an Open Text Account Executive, you drive digital transformation for global clients, solving complex business challenges and accelerating their journey to the cloud. Your consultative expertise and success in complex sales cycles contribute directly to business growth, earning you a competitive compensation package that recognizes your substantial impact in shaping the digital enterprise landscape.

title: Customer Success Manager
description:
**A Scaleup Journey + Entrepreneurial Environment!**
 Join Lime Go, a scaleup within Lime Technologies Sweden AB (publ). This is your chance to be part of a fast-moving, ambitious team while enjoying the success of a publicly listed company.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For?** 
 🤓
   

  

* 3+ years of experience in Sales or Customer Success.
* Proven B2B and SaaS experience—bonus if it's in CRM!
* Strong ability and motivation to retain and expand customer portfolios (a few hundred accounts).
* A customer-oriented doer who loves customer interaction and delivering value.
* A team player who likes responsibility in a dynamic and rapidly changing environment.
* Entrepreneurial mindset and excitement about the scaleup journey.


**Your Role on Our Team?** 
 👨🏻‍🤝‍👨🏻
   

  

* Own and manage a portfolio of B2B customers, building strong relationships and success.
* Retain, upsell, and grow accounts by challenging our customers to adopt new features.
* Deliver customer tailored demos (both online and in person).
* Own and be responsible for an order intake budget.
* Be a voice of the customer internally—collaborating with product and sales teams.


**The Product?** 
 🤑
   

  

 Lime Go is a Data Enriched Sales CRM for SMBs in the Nordics. With 1000 customers in Sweden, Norway, and Denmark, we’re aiming to expand throughout Europe to become the Category King within our niche.
   

  

**What’s the Journey?** 
 🚀
   

  

 We’re a team of 20 people, laser-focused on aggressive growth. Join us and be part of our scaleup journey as we continue to grow.
   

  

**Skills & Requirements**
**Requirements?**
* Bachelor’s degree 🎓 + Driver’s license 🚙
* SaaS/Startup/Scaleup experience
* Ready to work from our Stockholm office 🎈
* Fluent in Swedish and English 🎭


**Reporting & Growth**
 You’ll report directly to our Sales Manager, with regular 1:1s and be part of the Revenue Operations team (Sales, CS, Marketing & Product).
   

  

**Benefits & Perks?** 
 💸
   

  

* Competitive base salary + commission on portfolio growth
* Generous employee perks and benefits: collective agreement, company conferences and parties, 6 weeks vacation, pension, monthly pubs, merch, wellness allowance, and more
* Tons of team activities and laughs along the way!


**The Hiring Process?** 
 💻
   

  

* Screening call
* Interview
* In-depth interview with CS Team Manager (Patrik) & Lime Go Director (Max)
* Case assignment to show off your skills
* Reference check
* Final interview with Lime Group CEO (Nils) & Max


 Don’t miss the chance to kickstart your career at Lime Go - Apply now.
   

  

 Let’s Go!

title: Cloud Operations Architect, EU-North (EMEA)
description:
**Description**
 Would you like to join one of the fastest-growing organizations within Amazon Web Services (AWS), and help customers of all industries and sizes gain the best value and service from AWS? Cloud Operations Architects (COA) drive our customers’ creative and transformative spirit of innovation across all technologies - including Compute, Storage, Database, Big Data, Application-level Services, Networking, Serverless, Deployment, Security and more. This is not a sales role, but rather an opportunity to be the principal technical advisor and ‘voice of the customer’ to organizations ranging from start-ups to large enterprises in commercial and public sector.
   

  

 The Role
   

  

 As a COA, you will help craft and execute strategies to drive our customers’ adoption and use of AWS services - including EC2, S3, DynamoDB & RDS databases, Lambda, CloudFront CDN, IoT, and many more. Your technical acumen and customer-facing skills will enable you to effectively represent AWS within a customer’s environment, and drive discussions with senior leadership regarding incidents, trade-offs, support, and risk management.
   

  

 You will provide advocacy and strategic technical guidance to help plan and build solutions using best practices, and proactively keep your customers’ AWS environments operationally healthy. The close relationships developed with your customers will allow you to understand their business/operational needs and technical challenges, and help them achieve the greatest value from AWS. This position will require the ability to travel 10% or more as needed.
   

  

 The COA is the centerpiece of value to our Enterprise Support customers. If you wish to be at the forefront of innovation, come join us!
   

  

 AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 You’ll advise on solutions, provide technical guidance and advocate for the customer
   

  

* Ensure AWS environments remain operationally healthy whilst reducing cost and complexity
* Develop trusting relationships with customers, understanding their business needs and technical challenges
* Using your technical acumen and customer obsession, you’ll drive technical discussions regarding incidents, trade-offs, and risk management
* Consult with a range of partners from developers through to C-suite executives
* Collaborate with AWS Solutions Architects, Business Developers, Professional Services Consultants, and Sales Account Managers
* With a bias for action, you'll proactively find opportunities for customers to gain additional value from AWS
* Provide detailed reviews of service events, monthly & quarterly metrics, detailed pre-launch planning
* Solve a variety of problems across different customers as they migrate their workloads to the cloud


 A day in the life
   

  

 See what the team say about similar roles;
   

  

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M7j83fWoqmQ
   

  

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l48WpOmM5j4
   

  

**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship and Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Experience in a similar role as a Technical Account Manager, Consultant, Solutions Architect, Platform Engineer, Systems Engineer, Cloud Architect etc.
* Understand operational parameters and troubleshooting for four (2) of the following: Compute / Storage / Networking / CDN / Databases / DevOps / Big Data and Analytics / Security / Architecture / Applications Development in a distributed systems environment
* External customer-facing experience with the ability to clearly articulate to small and large audiences
* Ability to juggle tasks and projects in a fast-paced environment


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Professional experience with AWS and/or other cloud offerings such as Azure, Google Cloud Platform etc. Programming or scripting skills with a combination of Java, Python Perl, Ruby, C#, and/or PHP Previous experience as a Software Engineer, Developer, Solution Architect, DevOps Engineer, etc. Understanding of DevOps practices and tools, including: Continuous Integration / Deployment, Puppet, Docker, Kubernetes, Chef etc.


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.

title: Process Manager
description:
Are you ready to drive business improvements and make a real impact!? Then this could be the next step in your career!
   

  

 At Sandvik Group IT, we’re now looking for a proactive Process Manager to join our Global IT Process team. This is a key role in driving improvements across all processes – using data and insights to enhance efficiency, ensure compliance and alignment with business goals. Welcome!
   

  

**About Your Job**
 In this position, you drive business improvements using data and insights to measure effectiveness and communicate changes for a successful adaptation. You’re responsible for implementing processes effectively, identifying and suggesting improvements and tracking key results. You facilitate training, provide guidance and collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize efficiency. Additionally, you track progress on process objectives and key results through reporting and analysis, acting as a bridge between business and IT for process-related needs.
   

  

 Key responsibilities:
   

  

* Participate in relevant operational process forum and external audits.
* Review and resolve process issues.
* Escalate process expectations to Process Owner.
* Provide operational support to different stakeholders.
* Train and manage resources working in the process.
* Act as operational link for suppliers in accordance with their contracts.


 The location for this position is Stockholm or Sandviken and we apply a hybrid work set-up, allowing you to combine office and remote work.
   

  

**Your profile**
 We’re looking for someone with experience of ServiceNow as an IT Service Management (ITSM) tool. Your expertise in using KPIs and OKRs to measure process performance enables you to make data-driven decisions. You have an ITIL Foundation certification and an understanding of ITSM principles. It’s beneficial if you have work experience in Learning Management Systems, further enhancing your expertise. Your knowledge is backed by a university degree in a relevant field, or equivalent work experience. Acting in a global environment calls for proficiency in English and Swedish, both verbally and in writing.
   

  

 You’re proactive and take initiatives to identify and implement opportunities for development. You drive efficiency with a proven ability to align process strategy with day-to-day operations. Your strong coordination and communication skills enable you to effectively engage stakeholders, ensuring successful process adoption. With a focus on change management, you support and guide teams through transitions and foster a culture of continuous improvement.
   

  

**Our culture**
 Our role is clear – through every action, every day, we make the shift and advance the world through engineering. We believe in an inclusive, equal and open-minded culture, and we nurture our diversities to form a solid foundation for achieving great results. Add fair and rewarding benefits, as well as many different career options. Are you intrigued? Visit our website, LinkedIn or Facebook page to get to know us further.
   

  

**Contact information**
 For further information about this position, please contact Mikael Maad, recruiting manager, +46 (0)70 616 28 44
   

  

 We’ve already decided on which advertising channels and marketing campaigns we wish to use, and respectfully decline any additional contacts in that matter.
   

  

 Union contacts – Sweden
   

  

* Malena Rackner, Unionen, +46 (0)70 242 33 90
* Göran Norell, Akademikerföreningen, +46 (0)70 616 43 78
* Peter Olsson-Andrée, Ledarna, +46 (0)70 222 48 55


 Recruitment Specialist: Therese Rutqvist
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Send your application no later than April 4, 2025. Click apply and include your resume and cover letter in English. Please note that we don’t accept applications by e-mail. Job ID: R0076298.
   

  

 As we aim for a fair recruitment process, we utilize assessment tools to safeguard objectivity. When you apply for this job, you will therefore receive an invitation via email to a personality and logic ability test. Feedback comes immediately after the test has been completed and the selection process begins after the application deadline.
   

  

 To learn more about our recruitment process, please visit our career site or contact HR Services at hrservices.sweden@sandvik.com.
   

  

*Sandvik is a global, high-tech engineering group providing solutions that enhance productivity, profitability and sustainability for the manufacturing, mining and infrastructure industries. We are at the forefront of digitalization and focus on optimizing our customers’ processes. Our world-leading offering includes equipment, tools, services and digital solutions for machining, mining, rock excavation and rock processing. In 2023 the Group had approximately 41* 
*,000 employees and revenues of about 127 billion SEK in about 150 countries within continuing operations.*

title: Rättssakkunnig på Finansdepartementet
description:
**Rättssekretariatet, Finansdepartementet**
 Trivs du i en rådgivande roll där du tillsammans med skickliga och engagerade kollegor arbetar med intressanta juridiska frågor i en politisk miljö? I det omväxlande arbetet på Finansdepartementets rättssekretariat kan vi erbjuda dig som är hovrätts- eller kammarrättsassessor en utvecklande roll där du bidrar till samhällsutvecklingen.
   

  

**Din arbetsdag. Sveriges morgondag.**
 Rättssekretariatet ansvarar för utformningen av lagförslag och förordningar samt bistår departementsledningen och Finansdepartementets avdelningar med råd i juridiska frågor. Rättssekretariatet håller även interna utbildningar inom flera områden med koppling till Finansdepartementets verksamhet. För närvarande arbetar 14 personer på rättssekretariatet, varav de flesta har bakgrund som hovrätts- eller kammarrättsassessor. Rättssekretariatet har ett ansvarsområde som innefattar departementets samtliga avdelningar, med undantag för skatte- och tullavdelningen och finansmarknadsavdelningen. Detta innebär att sekretariatet ger rättslig rådgivning i ett stort antal frågor, bl.a. om statens budget, bolag med statligt ägande, digitalisering, bidragsbrott och felaktiga utbetalningar av offentliga medel, upphandlingslagstiftning, spelreglering, konsumenträtt, den statliga arbetsgivarpolitiken, myndighetsstyrning, kommunalrätt, Sveriges deltagande i internationella finansiella institutioner och statens innehav av fastigheter.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som vill ge rättslig rådgivning, bevaka enhetlighet i departementets produkter och utarbeta lagrådsremisser, propositioner och författningar inom rättssekretariatets ansvarsområde. Du kommer att arbeta tillsammans med professionella och kunniga kollegor, både specialister och personer med bred erfarenhet. Vi har ett digitalt arbetssätt, vilket ger förutsättningar att arbeta hemifrån två dagar i veckan. Rollen innebär många kontaktytor samt samarbete med andra avdelningar i Finansdepartementet och med övriga departement inom Regeringskansliet.
   

  

 Läs mer om vår verksamhet på www.regeringen.se .
   

  

**Din bakgrund**
 Vi söker en eller flera kvalificerade jurister med bakgrund som hovrätts- eller kammarrättsassessor och med mycket goda juridiska kunskaper.
   

  

**Dina egenskaper**
 Arbetet kräver att du har ett genuint intresse för samhällsfrågor, en god analytisk förmåga och ett gott omdöme. Du kan snabbt sätta dig in i nya frågor och tar ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter, driver processer framåt och ser till att uppnå resultat. Eftersom förutsättningarna för vårt arbete kan ändras snabbt är det viktigt att du är flexibel. Du har ett problemlösande arbetssätt och lägger stor vikt vid kvalitet samtidigt som du har förmåga att arbeta effektivt under tidspress. Du har mycket god förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift. Förankring och samverkan är grunden i arbetet och därför är det viktigt att du har en god samarbetsförmåga. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

**Övrigt**
 Tidsbegränsat förordnande som rättssakkunnig på 6 år respektive 2 år. En säkerhetsprövning kommer att genomföras innan beslut om anställning fattas.
   

  

**Är du intresserad?**
 Vill du veta mer om jobbet och vad vi erbjuder, kontakta ämnesrådet Elisabeth Sundin, tel. 08-405 90 63. Du är också välkommen att kontakta HR-handläggare Carl Garellick, tel. 08-405 44 49. Fackliga kontaktpersoner är Simon Monti Danielsson och Miriam Ben Hadj Ali för Saco och Lotta Nordqvist för ST. Du når dem via Regeringskansliets växel, 08-405 10 00. Vi tar gärna emot samtal från dig som är intresserad av jobbet men vi tackar nej till dig som säljer annonser och rekryteringstjänster.
   

  

 Välkommen att registrera din ansökan i vårt rekryteringsverktyg
 **senast den 1 april 2025.**
 Regeringskansliets uppdrag är att stödja regeringen i dess arbete med att styra Sverige och förverkliga sin politik. Här arbetar 4 800 personer, varav 600 utomlands. Regeringskansliet välkomnar sökande med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter. Vi ser jämställdhet och mångfald som en styrka och tillgång och vi arbetar aktivt för att vara en arbetsplats fri från diskriminering. Finansdepartementet ansvarar för frågor som rör statens ekonomi. Det handlar om samordning av statens budget, prognoser och analyser, skattefrågor samt styrning och förvaltning av statens verksamhet. Dessutom ansvarar departementet för frågor som rör finansmarknad, kommuner och regioner, upphandling, bolag med statligt ägande, digitalisering och it samt konsumentlagstiftning.

title: SVT söker systemförvaltare för Topdesk och IFenix
description:
**Vad Vi Erbjuder Dig**
 Hos oss på SVT kommer du att få arbeta i en verksamhet som engagerar, berikar och berör. Tillsammans med engagerade kollegor kommer du att arbeta i en kreativ miljö som skapar historia. Du kommer att få en varierande och händelserik vardag samtidigt som du arbetar på ett av Sveriges mest kända varumärken. Här väntar ett team med en familjär känsla som ständigt lär av varandra. Du kommer också att få vara med i spännande initiativ och projekt för att SVT ska bli framgångsrik i sin digitaliseringsresa. Vi hoppas att just du vill vara med!
   

  

**Vad Den Här Tjänsten Innebär**
 Rollen innebär att förvalta, uppgradera och genom interna dialoger fånga in verksamhetens behov och kravställning för att sedan utveckla och optimera systemen Topdesk och iFenix tillsammans med leverantörerna. Du kommer att ha ett nära samarbete med många nyckelfunktioner inom SVT samt att vara kontaktperson mot leverantörerna. Topdesk är SVT:s centrala ärendehanteringssystem och hjärtat i vår interna support och servicehantering. Här hanteras supportärenden, felanmälningar och beställningar. Systemet innehåller även vår tjänstekatalog och en kunskapsdatabas. IFenix är vårt affärs- och uthyrningssystem som används för att hantera uthyrningsverksamheten av kostymer, rekvisita och möbler i SVT:s Magasin4. Systemet är avgörande för att säkerställa att våra produktionsresurser används optimalt och att vi kan erbjuda en smidig och professionell service till våra kunder.
   

  

 Som systemförvaltare kommer du, tillsammans med ett team systemspecialister, att ingå i gruppen Teknisk Support. Du kommer att ha viktig roll i att säkra att våra interna processer fungerar smidigt och effektivt, vilket i sin tur stödjer SVT:s övergripande mål att leverera högkvalitativt innehåll till våra tittare.
   

  

**Vem Vi Tror Att Du Är**
